name: Jump Knights
description:
Enjoy the ultimate addicting jumping game!

Jump to the higher ground.
Special character-specific jump skill is activated!

[Game Features]
- A simple and easy casual jumping game for everyone!
- Challenge new world records with global players!
- Get up to the highest level avoiding various obstacles!
- Experience the special skills of cute, cute 3D characters!
